remarks: A condition for a structure not to be a semigroup.  (Contributed by AV, 30-Jan-2020.)
statement:
issgrpn0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
issgrpn0.o $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
isnsgrp $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( ( ( X .o. Y ) .o. Z ) =/= ( X .o. ( Y .o. Z ) ) -> M e/ SGrp ) ) $.
